data.message: My  friends account was hacked and she can't get back in.  She said they  are trying to blackmail her to get it back.  How can she contact FB so she can get her page back?  There are pictures of her kids on it.

replies.message: Hi Lexi. If your friend can't get into their account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell them to go to the Hacked Accounts section of the Help Center to get immediate help: http://on.fb.me/13sCY5n. Thank you! -Rose
Hello, she is locked out.  So how does she get to the help section.
Your friend does not need to be logged in to visit this link: http://on.fb.me/XqYbih. Once there, we can help her secure her account. -Rose
I don't know what I am doing my daughter signed me up.
Make a formal statement to the local police.
